Header: Prime Minister assures education with technology
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe says the aim of the government is to prepare an education system filled with technology. The Prime Minister said this while attending a function in Colombo.The annual prize giving ceremony of the Keebal International School took place under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. Prizes and certificates were given to the students who excelled in various fields. A large group of people including Principal of the Keebal International School, teachers and parents were present at the prize giving ceremony.
